website_summaries.verdict: High-tech filtration filters the air in your vehicle as often as 20 times per hour.
pros: Can be synced with Atem mobile app
Can be used in other small spaces as well
cons: It's expensive, and you could get a purifier for less - though perhaps not as thorough

customer_reviews.title: Freeway Exhaust Eliminated!
customer_reviews.text: I drive on the Los Angeles freeways for over 50 miles every day (110 Harbor FWY, 105 Century FWY, 405 San Diego FWY, 91 FWY). There are places where many of these freeways intersect and the air is always (often visibly) bad. The Atem car air purifier is a life changer. With all the exhaust, dust, and POLLEN, no longer IN my car, it is so much easy to breathe. I wish I had found this earlier. It even clears the horrible smell that I drive through every single day at the 605/91 intersection. It must be a water treatment facility and it is quite awful, but not for me... anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: So delighted with this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has severe allergies and asthma. When we travel in our RV throughout the summer, we sometimes drive through smokey areas caused by wildfires. We wondered "how would we have clean air to breathe when so many wildfires pollute the air?" Answer: IQAir ATEM car air HyperHEPA system. A GREAT system with easy to use bluetooth connection to my smartphone. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works even better
customer_reviews.text: I bought my car used, and the person who'd owned it before was a heavy smoker. The thing was laden with a heavy smoke smell that I've had to breathe for the last six months. Purchased this air purifier and I couldn't be happier. I feel healthier, more energetic and incredibly glad that I made this amazing purchase. It was incredibly easy to set-up, the app feels intuitive and I've no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Y

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Allergies!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up because my car is absolutely covered in pollen every morning, and it makes the drive to work miserable! Now I'm less stuffy and sneezy during the commute and no longer worried about breathing in all the emissions from the cars around me. It's definitely improved the quality of my drive and made long trips in the car a much more pleasurable experience!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Self defense against car fumes and air pollution
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to have an in-car air purifier in my BMW - I now have Peace of Mind knowing I have taken defensive measures against car/truck fumes and air pollution while commuting to and from the office. Very happy with my purchase, worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SWISS quality product but horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product is fairly well built, it’s compact, and engineered with precision. The only problem is their customer service. What is the point of having a Swiss product with horrible customer service? I would not recommend to any friends. You are paying for a product with no support.
customer_reviews.author: Loki Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great car air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect during wildfire season. Delivers fresh, clean air. Both car exhaust and cigarette smoke smell from other drivers are illuminated. Easy to install and operate. Can be installed out of the way behind second row seat if you have power outlet in the back/trunk area. Easy to control from your smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind while driving
customer_reviews.text: This product improves quality of life for family members with respiratory oroblems
customer_reviews.author: Helen Campbell

customer_reviews.title: barely moves air
customer_reviews.text: this machine barely moves air. I would guess it exchanges the air in my mid size car once or twice an hour. I thought, maybe the jack I have it plugged into in my car wasn't rated for enough wattage. But the jack is rated for 120W max, and this thing, get ready, uses 18 watts. Does it seem reasonable that a machine could HEPA scrub the air in your car many times per hour using 18 watts?
customer_reviews.author: Floatair

customer_reviews.title: Low out put and expensive
customer_reviews.text: Does not move enough air and is expensive. The particulates, VOC’s and CO2’s are still high inside the car.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: For me" I am out."
customer_reviews.text: I like the style but its not worth the money for something like this. For some ppl, they may just want to get it just to say they have it but sometimes things just are not worth the investment. It didn't seem to pull as much air as I would have liked. Its a nice size unit behind the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Garrett Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome air filter!
customer_reviews.text: Here's a picture of the iQ Air Atem in the cargo area of my SUV, hanging from the third row seat headrest. Just by chance it turns out the black version perfectly matches the charcoal dark gray and graphite light gray color scheme of the car's interior. The device hides very well in the cargo area like this. I'll come back in a few weeks to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Slikebutta

customer_reviews.title: Great new purifier for my car!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as expected. It was better packaging material than the Atem Desk that I bought which was nice. It was easy to set up with the quick start guide to attach to the seat and plug in. The cord was fairly long so it could reach the charging port with some slack to stay out of the way. I like that it is nice and quiet so when I drive to my appointments and daily errands I can have clean air without too much noise. Good device, does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It works great for my Asthma
customer_reviews.text: Every time I was driving in traffic my asthma would flare and I would be coughing the entire trip. My Husband got me the ATEM car. I ran it on high for about 15 mins and the next hour on medium. No more coughing. I ordered the desk kit for it and now bring it inside with me to sit on my desk or next to my chair. Running on low to medium it does a great job inside. I highly recommend this for asthma and allergy sufferers in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Filter !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! But you have to buy the filter from the IQ Air direct. Hard to get and very expensive. Almost 1/3 of the system price.
customer_reviews.author: okp

customer_reviews.title: Very gratifying to have this air purifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new car in September this year. The smell of formaldehyde in the new car is very stinky. We know exposure to the VOCs inside vehicles can cause cancer. I usually have a headache after driving for a while, so I decided to buy this top-class car air purifier. Although it is not very thin and lightweight, the fan noise is barely noticeable. Most important is that it can eliminate the odor that I hate in a very short time so that I can stay awake and comfortable when driving. Overall, I am gratifying and would recommend it to anyone who wants a healthy lifestyle!
customer_reviews.author: FANNKY

product_meta.title: IQAir [Atem Car Air Purifier [HyperHEPA Filter] Portable, Air Pollution, Cabin Filter, App Enabled, Allergies, Asthma, Pollen, Dust; Swiss Made
feature_bullets: HyperHEPA Plus filter removes up to 99% of particles down to 0.003 microns from your vehicle cabin, including PM2.5, CO2, and diesel soot as well as common traffic pollutants like SO2 and Nox
Efficient filtration system cleans the air in your car up to 20 times per hour
Powerful, efficient, and ultra-quiet multi-phase fan motor allows quiet, constant operation without losing filtration efficacy
270-degree centrifugal fan draws in cabin air through 3-stage particle and gaseous filter for maximum removal of harmful air pollutants
Direct purchases from the manufacturer will require a signature to acknowledge receipt upon delivery.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars27 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: We guarantee that your system is free from defects, or we will fix or replace it for free. Register your product within 30 days to be eligible for 3-year Limited Warranty
